channel.title: Toggle run upon log in
channel.description:
so yeah, im fed up of having to turn on run manually eveytime i log in, i just want it to be on as soon as i log in, already made it so it doesnt deplete.
running 317/474
*edit* ok so ive fixed my main problem which is the one stated above, however, now im encountering a minor annoyance which is that the run icon doesnt light up red when i check my options tab after i log in, it does however let me run, if i click it once, it flashes and then goes to its regular grey (walking mode) again, after that i can click it and it goes red and my run will be activated again, does anyone known how i can fix this?

item.title: Toggle run upon log in
item.dc:creator: @RubixD RubixD
item.description:
@RubixD wrote:

[quote=“Fire capez, post:2, topic:525364”]find the run button id (think it’s 152)
find which method turns run on (probably something like player.getPA().setRunning(true))
call the method when the server starts[/quote]

ill try this, thank you, please keep posting solutions incase this doesnt work for me or for others

Read full topic
